Name: Esra
Description:
Esra died by suicide.

> Esra committed suicide this evening (02.03.2019) at around 18:00 hours in the Büyük Esat district of Ankara. According to the information provided by neighbors who reached Pembe Hayat, this evening (02.03.2019), Esra's boyfriend came to her house, discovered that she had hanged herself and called the police. Neighbors saw the police and ambulance arrive at the scene. 
>
> According to the information given by activists of Pembe Hayat and Esra's friends, crime scene investigation teams gathered evidence and Esra's body was sent for autopsy to the Forensic Medicine Institute in Keçiören. It is reported that no information has yet been received from Esra's family.
> 
> Emrah Sahin, the lawyer of the Pink Life Association, stated that the autopsy process will be followed by the activists to determine the cause of the suicide and the funeral process will be arranged by activists if they Esra's family do not organise it.
 
http://www.pembehayat.org/haberler/detay/2073/ankararsquoda-trans-kadin-intihar-etti

Name: Brigitte Galván Uc
Description:
Brigitte died from head injuries several days after being thrown from a vehicle.

> After hovering for several days between life and death, the young [deadname] Galván Uc, 20, who was thrown from a trailer and hit [her] head, died.
> 
> Witnesses reported that "Brigitte", as Galván Uc was presented, was thrown out of the truck on the Mérida-Cancún highway, when [she] was exercising sexeservice (the mention of this fact is to understand under what circumstances the murder occurred, not to condemn the activity of the victim).
> 
> It was common to see [her] on the Pisté-Xcalacoop section, where the events occurred a few days ago, when [she] was thrown from a trailer in motion.
> 
> When [she] fell, the young [woman] suffered a severe traumatic brain injury. When witnesses went to help [her], they found [her] with a wound on [her] head, which was bleeding profusely.

Her exact date of death was not reported, but the report is dated 3rd March 2019.

http://yucatanahora.mx/muere-travesti-lo-arrojan-de-un-trailer-en-movimiento/

Name: Marisol Montenegro
Description:
Marisol Montenegro's body was found in her home in Puerto Montt, Los Lago (Chile) on 7 Mar 2019. She had been beaten and strangled and her home robbed. > We deeply regret the murder of Marisol Montenegro of Puerto Montt, a transgender woman who was murdered in her bed and left there by her perpetrator for many hours before being found. We want justice done! No more murders are women #Trans!

Lamentamos profundamente el asesinato de Marisol Montenegro de Puerto Montt, mujer trans que fue asesinada en su cama y dejada ahí por su victimario por muchas horas antes de ser encontrada. Queremos que se haga justicia! No más asesinatos se mujeres #Trans!

— Franco Fuica (@francofuica) March 10, 2019
https://www.eldesconcierto.cl/2019/03/10/confuso-crimen-de-mujer-trans-enluta-a-puerto-montt-su-cuerpo-fue-encontrado-con-senales-de-golpes-y-estrangulamiento/ https://twitter.com/francofuica/status/1104545508591325189

Name: Flávia Santana
Description:
Flávia was found hanging with cuts on her neck and both wrists in her apartment in the Santa Maria de Nazareth neighborhood. She had only just arrived back in the country two days earlier.

Her family suspects that she was murdered.

> The death of the trans woman Flávia Santana on the night of last Friday (08) in an apartment located in the neighborhood Santa Maria de Nazareth will be investigated by the Civil Police. Flavia had arrived from abroad last Wednesday (06) when she spoke with her relatives, on Thursday (07) the family could no longer get in touch with her. Last night Flavia's sister went to her apartment that was locked, the door had to be broken into, Flavia Santana was found inside the bathroom hanging from the window with a cut on her neck and both wrists.
> 
> Several friends commented on social networks that do not believe in suicide, according to the postings she was a very cheerful person and had several plans with her return from abroad.
> 
> "Flavinha was murdered, it was not suicide, she had surgery, she was going to buy a new car and plans to buy a house in the northeast, who knows she knows she would never do that." said one of Flavia's friends.
> 
> Other people say that Flavia has a history of depression and takes controlled medicine, the day before she would have apologized to the mother and sister who did not understand. The Civil Police works with the possibility of suicide, but alternative conclusions may be drawn once expert reports have been completed.

Flávia's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/flavia.santanna.37.

http://www.anapolisnoticias24h.com.br/amigos-nao-acreditam-que-transexual-tenha-tirado-a-propria-vida-em-anapolis/

https://www.facebook.com/589269307890368/photos/a.589280527889246/1303863433097615/?type=3&theater

https://www.facebook.com/groups/pgmreal/permalink/2574900629249889/

Name: Renata Spencer
Location: El Cerrito, Tepeji del Río, Hidalgo
Description:
Renata's body was found near Antigua Mexico-Queretaro (Federal Highway 17) on the morning of Saturday 9th March. She had a head wound.

> After the funeral of Renata Spencer, a 20-year-old trans woman whose body was found on Saturday morning in the town of El Cerrito, family and friends displayed placards with the caption "We are all Renata" and demanded investigation of her homicide.
> 
> According to police reports, on Saturday morning, municipal agents located the body of the young woman lying in the Los Reyes camp, located on the side of the old Mexico-Queretaro federal highway.
> 
> At the time of the discovery, the deceased had her trousers at knee height; she wore a gray shirt, vest, and black boots. The body had a wound on the head.
> 
> "It's not fair that they killed her in this way, it's a murder because of her gender." The authorities must clarify what happened and stop the murderers," said a friend of the victim.

Renata's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/renatita.spencer.

https://www.am.com.mx/hidalgo/noticias/Convocan-a-marcha-por-asesinato-de-Renata-Spencer-mujer-transgenero-20190309-0025.html

Name: Pâmella
Description:
Pâmella was shot three times. According to her family, she had no involvement in crime and they do not know why she was killed.

Rede Paraense de Pessoas Trans

Name: Nazab Abid Shaikh
Description:
Nazab was murdered by Arbaz Ahmed Shaikh, 20, after they argued about his wish to end their relationship.

> In a gruesome incident, a young transgender person was found murdered in her house, allegedly by her jilted lover near Mohammadwadi in the early hours of Monday.
> 
> The victim was identified as Nazab Abid Shaikh, 21, a resident of Sadashiv Nagar in Hadapsar. According to the police, they received a distress call early in the morning informing that Shaikh was found lying in a pool of blood.
> 
> Cops found the lock of Shaikh’s house on the third floor broken and her throat slit by a sharp object.
> 
> According to the police, Shaikh was having an affair with a young man from the area. Recently, he started making plans to get married to someone else. This upset Shaikh who then threatened to make their affair public. A quarrel seemed to have occurred between the duo which led to the murder, cops said.

Arbaz Ahmed Shaikh was arrested the following day.

https://www.mid-day.com/articles/estranged-lover-slits-transgender-womans-throat-after-she-threatens-him-to-go-public/20560196

Name: Caio Dantas Monteiro
Location: Angra dos Reis, Rio de Janeiro
Description:
Caio and his girlfriend Iasmym Nascimento de Souza da Silva, 20, were stabbed to death by a neighbour on Matelândia Street in the Japuíba neighborhood after he propositioned Iasmym and she turned him down.

Itamar Bernardo da Silva, 44, was taken into custody and charged with double homicide while trying to escape to Barra Mansa. At the police station he was also found to have an outstanding arrest warrant for the murder of a woman in Araxá, Minas Gerais.

Name: Alessandra
Description:
Alessandra was shot in the neck and abdomen after leaving a party on Urupa Street in Sector 6 of Buritis.

> A 25-year-old trans woman was shot to death on Sunday morning (17), on Urupa Street, Sector 6, in Buritis (RO), in the Jamari Valley. According to the Military Police (PM), the victim had left the party and was approached by the suspect when he returned home.
> 
> The PM was deployed around 5 o'clock, residents reported hearing the sound of four gunshots, and when they found they had found the victim's body lying in the street. The policemen went to the scene and found that the victim was dead.
> 
> Witnesses reported to PM that the victim was at a party with some friends and the moment she returned home, was approached by a suspect who fired the shots and fled the scene.

Description:
The victim's body was found in scrubland wrapped in plastic sheeting with signs of having been tortured. Their genitals and limbs had been mutilated.

> The report to 911 arrived at about 9:45 in the morning, when several people who cast the role in Supermanzana 318, right where that subdivision is divided with the colony El Pedregal, realized that there was a naked body and traces of torture, wrapped in plastic.
> 
> It was confirmed that the body had a cut in the neck, a wound in the left hand, as well as severe blows in the face, another cutting injury in the nose, in addition to chafing in the wrists as if it had been tied.

Name: Victoria Medeiros
Description:
Victoria died by suicide. The circumstances and date of her death are unknown, but the most recent public entry on her Facebook profile was on 12th February and her profile was posted to a memorial site on 26th March.

Her Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100023019017126.

Name: Ashanti Carmon
Description:
Ashanti was shot and killed early on the morning of Saturday 30th March.

> Fairmount Heights police said they responded to the area of Aspen and Jost streets around 6:23 a.m. after receiving numerous calls for shots fired. At the scene, a transgender woman was located and pronounced dead at the scene after being shot multiple times.
> 
> The victim has been identified as Ashanti Carmon, ABC7 has learned.
> 
> "I had seen her I believe on Tuesday because she would come through my office at HIPS,” said Earline Budd, a transgender activist.
> 
> HIPS is a group with which Budd is associated that finds alternatives to sex work for transgender people.
> 
> “She wasn’t someone that frequented the streets a lot, so that’s why it’s so shocking and the community is stunned,” Budd said. “I’ve been getting calls all day about this murder.”
> 
> Budd says they try to discourage the transgender women from coming to the area.
> 
> “We’ve had quite a few transgender folks who have been assaulted, have been shot, who have been stabbed in that area,” Budd said.

https://planettransgender.com/dc-transgender-woman-ashanti-carmon-murdered-tdov-weekend/

https://www.out.com/news/2019/4/01/ashanti-carmon-found-dead-amid-ongoing-violence-against-trans-women

http://www.fox5dc.com/news/local-news/fairmount-heights-transgender-murder-victim-identified-by-family-friend

https://wjla.com/news/local/community-and-neighbors-concerned-after-trans-woman-fatally-shot-on-eastern-avenue

Name: Paty Figueiredo dos Santos
Description:
Paty was strangled and robbed inside her salon at home in the Colonia Terra Nova II neighborhood to the north of Manaus. Her body was found with her hands and feet tied.

She was 36.

> Manaus / AM - A hairdresser was found dead this morning (30), inside her own residence located on Avenida Buritis in the neighborhood of Colonia Terra Nova II, in the northern part of the Amazonian capital. The victim was identified as [deadname] Figueiredo dos Santos, 36 years old.
> 
> According to information from the hairdresser's family, her mother would have called [Paty] early in the morning, but she did not answer the phone. When her mother went to the daughter's she found the body of the hairdresser.
> 
> [Paty's] body was found with her hands and feet tied and a pillow covering her face.
> 
> Neighbors of the victim informed the police that the hairdresser was last seen accompanied by three unidentified men on Friday night (29).

Paty's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100010846119087.

Name: Shalu
Description:
Shalu was found dead in suspicious circumstances near a bus stop on the Sankunni Nair Road at around 9am on Monday 1st April - the day after International Transgender Day of Visibility.

She had previously complained of being harassed and it is suspected that she was murdered.

> A 35-year-old transgender woman was found dead on the roadside in Kozhikode in the early hours of Sunday. The deceased has been identified as Shalu, a resident of Kannur, who had reached Kozhikode on Friday. She was found on the Shankunni Nair Road, near the KSRTC bus stand in Kozhikode. At around 9 am on Monday morning, residents of the neighbourhood discovered her body and alerted the Nadakkavu police station.
> 
> Meanwhile, the transgender community in Kozhikode have expressed a strong suspicion of foul play in her death.
> 
> “I strongly suspect that she was murdered. She had earlier complained to me about some people harassing her. But we will only know once the post mortem report is done and the police investigation is completed,” Sisly Georg, a transgender activist and founder of Punarani Cultural Society, which works for trans rights, told TNM.
> 
> Sisly also added that CCTV footage of two men have been retrieved by the police following the incident.
> 
> “Shalu might have been engaging in sex work and that brought her to the area where she was found dead. The police have identified two men caught on the CCTV camera. They were walking near the area. Now the investigation will go in that direction,” Sisily added.
